name: GKStateMachine
desc: A finite-state machine—a collection of state objects that each define logic for a particular state of gameplay and rules for transitioning between states.

items.name: init(states: [GKState])
items.desc: Initializes a state machine with the specified states.

items.name: func canEnterState(AnyClass) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether it is valid for the state machine to transition from its current state to a state of the specified class.

items.name: func enter(AnyClass) -> Bool
items.desc: Attempts to transition the state machine from its current state to a state of the specified class.

items.name: func update(deltaTime: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Tells the current state object to perform per-frame updates.
